attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing. Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description:
$5000 HELP WITH CLOSING COSTS!! IF UNDER CONTRACT BY FEBRUARY 18TH BUYER MAY CHOOSE INTERIOR PAINT COLORS!

EVERTYHING IS NEW! Remodeled 3 bed 2 bath 2 living area home with sunroom. All new windows,
flooring, front door, new sliding back door, new deck in
backyard. HVAC system (with warranty) new plumbing, water lines,
gas line, new electrical, and insulation. Both bathrooms and kitchen
completely remodeled. Exterior and interior freshly painted. The back yard is large with an above ground storm shelter and firepit. Finishes are still being done. Home will be available for showings 2/9
